name: @inrupt/solid-client-vc
description: A library to act as a client to a server implementing the W3C VC HTTP APIs.

scripts.build-docs-preview-site: npm run build-api-docs; cd docs/api; rm source/api/index.md; make html; cd ../; rm -r dist || true; mkdir -p dist/api; cp -r api/build/html/. dist/;
